text:
[Verse]
Wake up with the sunshine
Dancing in my eyes
Feel the world is smiling
Golden rays arise

[Verse 2]
Skipping through the meadows
With no shoes or ties
Chasing all the shadows
Under blue sky highs

[Chorus]
Sunflower days
Bright and gay
Laugh and dance
In the light’s embrace

[Verse]
We'll sing with the sparrows
Songs of joy and love
Whisper to the willows
Feel the winds above

[Bridge]
Life like a painting
Colors wild and free
Everyday we're finding
A new way to be

[Chorus]
Sunflower days
Bright and gay
Laugh and dance
In the light’s embrace
title: Sunflower Days
